page.title: 17Farming
page.content:
Most people have farms around here. Barley is grown and in the spring silage is made and hay a little later. Some farmers grow potatoes.
There is a lot of work so implements are needed to help. Tractors,trailers, ploughs,forragers,balers are used.
Sheep,dairy cattle,fat cattle and pigs are kept. Sheep,are sheared every spring and the wool sold.
Agricultural Shows are held in many places. The Royal Welsh Show is the main event for all Welsh farmers. My father competes in the Welsh Cob Section D class.
